Parameters:

Returns:

Throws:

Returns a service implementation compatible with serviceClass and the specified service properties

Type Parameters:
T - the serviceClass type
Parameters:
serviceClass - the serviceClass contract

Returns:
a service implementation compatible with serviceClass contract.
Throws:
javax.management.ServiceNotFoundException - if no implementation is found for the service or the properties
